original_text: All the leaders and the mighty men, and also all the sons of King David, pledged their allegiance to King Solomon.
korean_text: 모든 방백과 용사와 다윗 왕의 여러 아들들이 솔로몬 왕에게 복종하니

sentences.original_text: All the leaders and the mighty men
and also all the sons of King David
pledged their allegiance to King Solomon
